item.title: Seasonal Bump Functions
item.description: Motivated by the nice talk on Winning with Simple, even Linear, Models by Vincent D. Warmerdam, I briefly describe how to construct certain class of bump functions to encode seasonal variables in R. Prepare Notebook library(glue) library(lubridate) library(magrittr) library(tidyverse) Generate Data Let us generate a time sequence variable stored in a tibble. # Define time sequence. t <- seq.Date(from = as.Date("2017-07-01"), to = as.Date("2019-04-01"), by = "day") # Store it in a tibble.
